Class AcademicDepartmentHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flexisaf.ses.student.handlers.AcademicDepartmentHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class AcademicDepartmentHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class serves to decouple the department rest service endpoint from its corresponding data access service.
